name: mustang
description: Mustang - Video conference, chat, mail, calendar, files, contacts

scripts.build:android: npm run build:android:apk && npm run build:android:aab
scripts.build:android:apk: export MOBILE_ARCH=android-arm64; npm run build && cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.build:android:aab: export MOBILE_ARCH=android-arm64; npm run build && cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew :app:bundleRelease
scripts.build:ios: export MOBILE_ARCH=ios-arm64; (cd ios && bash ./build/build.sh) && cap sync ios && cap build ios
